resources.string: Fetching finished with %d Errors.\n Please contact developers. The program can still run normally.
ERROR: Cannot get any server!\ Check your network connection, or contact developer!
ERROR: Your client is outdated! Please update! Minimal protocol ver: %s
Write External Storage permission allows us to install routes. Please allow this permission in App Settings.
%s\nDownload paused.%sTo delete downloaded file, see settings.
Update is available for %d packages!\nPlease see Manage page for detail.
It seems network connection is not available.\nBCS cannot download packages.\nRemoving local packages is still possible.
There is no content of this type.
For abuse or copyright claims, please contact the uploader. If your demand is not satisfied, you can contact server maintainers:
Space used to cache images locally
Try if slow connection is experienced
Manually specify a UGC server that you prefer
Fetch source server list from index servers
Metadata merged to speed up loading
Servers used to fetch Source Servers
Show logs at the loading screen

BVE Content Service Client (BCSC)\ Designed & Programmed by zbx1425\ Contact me at zbx1425@outlook.com.\ Visit project website at https://bvecontentservice.github.io or https://bvecontentservice.gitee.io\ Visit my website at https://www.zbx1425.tk\ \ This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.\ You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program. If not, see https://www.gnu.org/licenses/.\ To acquire a copy of the source code of this software, please refer to https://github.com/BVEContentService/BCSClientAndroid.\ \ BCSC uses OkHttp for networking.\ OkHttp is a nice HTTP client for Android.\ Thanks Square Open Source Inc.\ Licensed under Apache 2.0.\ https://square.github.io/okhttp\ \ BCSC uses OkDownload for multi-thread downloading.\ OkDownload is a awesome reliable, flexible, fast and powerful download engine.\ Thanks LAIX Inc. for such a generous project.\ Licensed under Apache 2.0.\ https://github.com/lingochamp/okdownload\ \ BCSC uses DiskLruCache for image caching.\ DiskLruCache is an easy-to-use disk-based LRU cache.\ Thanks Jake Wharton for such a beautiful library.\ Licensed under Apache 2.0.\ https://github.com/JakeWharton/DiskLruCache\ \ Thanks Asnacinjar, Tucson, and CSSSC for their support during the developing of this program.\ Quite a few other open-source programs and resources have been used during the development of BCSC, which cannot be completely listed here. I will pay my personal respect to all the collaborators of the open source community.
